comment.author: 15516911@N08
comment._content: All this ice could easily sink a ship

comment.author: 69214992@N08
comment._content: a very sensational photo of the frozen tunra

comment.author: 26596549@N08
comment._content: My father was in the Artic Convoys. He was a gunner in the newly formed Maritime Regiment. He hated being cold at the best of times I dread to think what he must of gone through sailing in such freezing conditions.

comment.author: 36491519@N02
comment._content: How on earth they managed to live and work in these conditions, let alone fight off air attacks etc is beyond my imagination, and from what I have read, the indifferent and suspicious reception they received in Murmansk must have been even worse
